body_html: I have the same question, the beta (bias) has been implemented as tf.nn.bias_add and it support NCHW or NHWC format, but I didn't find the alpha op. So right now I constuct my own scale layer in python, which seems a little slower.

body: I have the same question, the beta (bias) has been implemented as tf.nn.bias_add and it support NCHW or NHWC format, but I didn't find the alpha op. So right now I constuct my own scale layer in python, which seems a little slower.
